"Have you considered partnering with local organizations or community groups to help fund and support the establishment of the nature conservation park?"
"What are the specific goals and objectives of the nature conservation park, and how will they be achieved?"
"Have you considered the potential impact of the nature conservation park on the local ecosystem and wildlife, and how will you mitigate any negative effects?"
"What measures will be taken to ensure the sustainability of the nature conservation park, both financially and environmentally?"
"Have you considered implementing educational programs or outreach initiatives to raise awareness about the importance of nature conservation and the role of the park in protecting it?"
